programme.title: The Death of the Old Media
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cook uses Rip Van Winkle to understand the Time Warner and America Online deal.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cook takes in the story of Rip Van Winkle as he tries (and fails) to make sense of the multi-million dollar tie up between Time Warner and America Online.
